name: Mohamed Salah Merza
title: Proposals Expert & Founder of Merza Group
tagline: Helping You Secure 7-Figure Deals Faster Through High-Impact Proposals

bio.short: Strategic proposals manager with 15+ years of experience winning complex tenders and leading high-performing teams across government, enterprise, and technology sectors.
bio.full:
With over 15 years in proposal management and business development, I've led the successful delivery of 200+ winning proposals worth billions in contract value. My expertise spans strategic positioning, compliance excellence, and team leadership across government, enterprise, and technology sectors.

I'm passionate about transforming complex tender requirements into compelling, winning narratives. My approach combines deep industry knowledge, meticulous attention to detail, and a commitment to building lasting client relationships.

Beyond proposals, I mentor emerging professionals and share insights on leadership, proposal strategy, and organizational excellence through speaking engagements and thought leadership content.

mission: To elevate proposal excellence as a strategic business function and mentor the next generation of proposal leaders.
philosophy: Excellence in every detail, from compliance to storytelling
